title: Millions swelter as UK endures its 1st extreme heat warning
content:
1. Millions swelter as UK endures its 1st extreme heat warning  The Associated Press
  2. What impact will 40°C heat have on the UK? - BBC News  BBC News
  3. UK and Europe Heat Wave News: Latest News and Live Updates  The New York Times
  4. The terrifying truth: Britain’s a hothouse, but one day 40C will seem cool  The Guardian
  5. British heatwave risks hottest day ever as wildfires rage across Europe  NBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 英国で初の猛暑警報が発令され、何百万人もの人々が暑さに苦しんでいます。
英国首次发布极端高温警告，数百万人闷热难耐
英國首次發佈極端高溫警告，數百萬人悶熱難耐
